alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 18 at 3:35AM EST until December 19 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches across higher terrain. * WHERE...Wyoming, Cattaraugus, and Southern Erie counties. Greatest snow amounts across the Boston Hills, ridges of western Wyoming County, and the higher terrain of western and northern Cattaraugus County. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 10 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult with snow covered roads and poor visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the Monday evening commute and especially the Tuesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Periods of snow will result in snow covered roads and limited visibilities. Slow down and use caution while driving. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
